verses.text: \w Do|strong="G3361"\w* \w we|strong="G5613"\w* \w begin|strong="G0757"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*? \w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w do|strong="G3361"\w* \w we|strong="G5613"\w* \w need|strong="G5535"\w* (\w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w do|strong="G3361"\w*) epistles \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w commendation|strong="G4956"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*?

\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* epistle, \w written|strong="G1449"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*:

\w Being|strong="G1510"\w* \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* epistle \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*, \w and|strong="G2316"\w* \w written|strong="G1449"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w ink|strong="G3188"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w tables|strong="G4109"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w stone|strong="G3035"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* fleshly \w tables|strong="G4109"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w confidence|strong="G4006"\w* \w we|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, towards \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w sufficient|strong="G2425"\w* \w to|strong="G5100"\w* \w think|strong="G3049"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* thing \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* sufficiency \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w made|strong="G2227"\w* \w us|strong="G2427"\w* fit ministers \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* testament, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w letter|strong="G1121"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w letter|strong="G1121"\w* killeth, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* quickeneth.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ministration \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, engraven \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w letters|strong="G1121"\w* \w upon|strong="G3037"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w*, \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w*; \w so|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* children \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* steadfastly behold \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* countenance, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* void:

\w How|strong="G4459"\w* shall \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ministration \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ministration \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w condemnation|strong="G2633"\w* \w be|strong="G3123"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ministration \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* aboundeth \w in|strong="G4052"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w reason|strong="G1752"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* excelleth.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w done|strong="G2673"\w* \w away|strong="G2673"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* remaineth \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w we|strong="G2192"\w* \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3954"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \w a|strong="G5087"\w* \w veil|strong="G2571"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w*, \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* children \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* steadfastly \w look|strong="G0816"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w made|strong="G5087"\w* void.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* senses \w were|strong="G3588"\w* made dull. \w For|strong="G1063"\w*, \w until|strong="G0891"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* present \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* selfsame \w veil|strong="G2571"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w reading|strong="G0320"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w old|strong="G3820"\w* testament, remaineth \w not|strong="G3361"\w* taken \w away|strong="G2673"\w* (\w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* made void).

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w even|strong="G2193"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G4594"\w*, \w when|strong="G0846"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w read|strong="G0314"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w veil|strong="G2571"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w shall|strong="G2962"\w* \w be|strong="G2962"\w* converted \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w veil|strong="G2571"\w* \w shall|strong="G2962"\w* \w be|strong="G2962"\w* \w taken|strong="G4014"\w* \w away|strong="G4014"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w beholding|strong="G2734"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w with|strong="G0575"\w* open \w face|strong="G4383"\w*, \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w transformed|strong="G3339"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w by|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
